definition: to draw out/to pull out from in between/to remove part of the whole/(of certain plants) to sprout or bud/to whip or thrash

sentences.english: The range fan needs a lot of power to run.
sentences.chinese: 抽油烟机需要很大的功率来运转。

sentences.english: This cooker hood is not fixed at the proper angle.
sentences.chinese: 这个抽油烟机安装的角度不合适。

sentences.english: The utility model can be used for cooking fume exhausters and exhaust devices.
sentences.chinese: 可用于抽油烟机或排气装置上。

sentences.english: Chimney hood exhaust with more exhaustion power, which is suitable for all nationalities.
sentences.chinese: 抽油烟机具备超强动力，适用于任何国家。

sentences.english: If smoke what lampblack machine uses much high-power?
sentences.chinese: 如抽油烟机用多大功率的？

sentences.english: Combustion gases are collected by an exhaust hood for further analysis.
sentences.chinese: 燃烧过的气体被抽油烟机收集以作进一步分析。

sentences.english: The invention discloses an energy-saving smoke exhauster with switchable left and right air inlets.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种左右进风口可切换的节能抽油烟机。

sentences.english: You turn on the stove first, and pour some oil in the pan.
sentences.chinese: 炒菜前先打开炉子上的抽油烟机。

sentences.english: The smoke exhauster will take away the smoke when we are cooking.
sentences.chinese: 当我们做饭时抽油烟机将会抽走油烟。

sentences.english: Used in ducted and ductless range hoods and over the counter microwave ovens.
sentences.chinese: 使用在有和无管道式抽油烟机以及柜式微波炉中。

sentences.english: The lampblack drawer can keep you away from kitchen diseases.
sentences.chinese: 这台抽油烟机能够帮助你远离厨房病。

sentences.english: Turn on the fan over the stove before you start frying.
sentences.chinese: 炒菜前先打开炉子上的抽油烟机。
您将需要新的抽油烟机。
